summary: Completed comprehensive review of Beauty Booking module. Fixed revenue recording for cash payments by adding updatePaymentStatus method and markPaid endpoints (API and Web). Added scheduled command UpdateExpiredSubscriptions to automatically update expired subscriptions and recalculate badges daily. Fixed calendar system to unblock time slots when bookings are completed. Verified: 1) Booking flow records revenue in all paths (payment success hook, status update to confirmed, payment status update to paid), 2) Commission calculation is correct with proper hierarchy (category+level > category > level > default), 3) Badge system auto-updates when bookings complete, reviews approved, subscriptions expire (via scheduled command), 4) Ranking algorithm correctly calculates all 6 factors with configurable weights, 5) Calendar system properly blocks time slots on booking creation and unblocks on cancellation/completion.
current_status: All 5 critical review items completed. Module is now fully functional with proper revenue recording, commission calculation, badge auto-updates, ranking algorithm, and calendar management. All systems verified and working correctly.
